contentrichtext.text: The '''Vegas''' is a [[Gottlieb]] [[pinball]] machine with a [[card game]] theme. It first appeared in July 1990. About 1500 were manufactured. Several [[strategy|strategies]] allow players to win a free game: *Reaching the "replay" score determined by the machine (1 credit). *Winning in the lottery (1 credit). *Completing the table (the 13 cards) (3 credits). *Passing into the corridor of the "special joker" when it flickers (1 credit). *Completing the 7 "7"s to touch the lady on the table (1 credit). *Obtaining a mystical special (1 credit). The motif feature graphics that were already [[retro]] in the era of its release. The dominant color is pink with a charming hostess on the vertical display at the back of the machine. ==External links== *[http://www.ipdb.org/machine.cgi?id=2724&raise= The Internet Pinball Database entry on of this machine] [[Category:1990 pinball machines]] [[Category:Gottlieb pinball machines]] {{pinball-stub}}
